title: How To secure your Yourself from Wireshark on Public WiFi
tags: How Easy It's to Hack WiFi
How easy is it to capture data on public free Wi-Fi?
description: This video shows, how easy its for the hackers to hack public WiFi using packet sniffing app called Wireshark, and what steps can you take to prevent it.
